amendatorysection.chaptername: Monopolies and Unlawful Restraint of Trade
amendatorysection.catchline: Marketing plan contract; purchaser; right to cancel; when.
amendatorysection.para: The purchaser shall have the right to cancel a seller-assisted marketing plan contract for any reason at any time within three business days of the date the purchaser and the seller sign the contract pursuant to section 59-1744. The notice of the right to cancel and the procedures to be followed when a contract is canceled shall comply with sections 59-1743 and 59-1744.
